      • joinParams

        public static java.lang.String joinParams(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> queryParams,
                          boolean isUri)
        Join parameters map into string, usually query string
        Parameters:
        queryParams - Map to join
        isUri - Indicates that value parameters must be uri-encoded
        Returns:
        Result query string, like k=v&k1=v1
